title: No Pay to Win
text:
No item shop

No votingpoint system

No other kind of pay-to-win!

title: Referal Program
text:
Recruit-a-Friend ( 1 - 60 )

3x the experience while leveling with your friend!

Summon your friend directly towards you!

Grant levels to your friends
